QuestData.Title: Drowned Mana
QuestData.Description:
How did you end up out here? Ah well, that's neither here nor there at this point. What matters is that I need your help!
I see you have some experience fishing. Think you could put that skill to use for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Fish up a Drowned Mana for Conjurer Margoss.
QuestData.RewardText: That's it! This will do nicely. Please bring me as many of these as you can!
